head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BROMLEY, TARQUIN JAY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BROMLEY, TARQUIN JAY

block.p: BROMLEY-Tarquin Jay, Councilman of Scotch Plains, N.J.; former New York Assistant Attorney General and co-founder of the Pearl Theater in New York. Husband of Linda (nee Van Fossen) Bromley; father of Alexander; son of Haila Stoddard and sibling of Robin, Christopher and Erin. Funeral service, today, September 30th, at 11:00 AM at the Rossi Funeral Home, 1937 Westfield Avenue in Scotch Plains, New Jersey.
